Hello dear parents and teachers! I Roman Popov as the creator of this application thank you for downloading it and I hope that its use will be convenient and effective for you and will also bring only positive emotions.

If you find a bug (an error in the application) or you have an idea that you want to see here you can contact me on Telegram / Instagram using the nickname @romchi_lolchi or by email - pri20051982@gmail.com.

Also I would like to leave a couple of tips so that children train and learn more effectively:
  1. It is better to train a little but often.
    2. To do this you can set the maximum time for one training session and the duration of the breaks in the settings. Also in the same section of the application you can turn on notifications about the desired start of a training.
  2. Set aside a specific training time in your child\'s schedule.
    3. This will help your child to develop a habit as well as exercise systematically which will allow your child to better remember and assimilate information
  3. Turn on the achievement system in the application settings by linking your Google Play Games account

Hey! This application should help you to completely learn the multiplication table as soon as possible regardless of your initial level. To make this happen faster train a little but often and be sure to take breaks. It will be very good if you set aside a special time for training every day. Of course the result will not be immediately visible but in the near future it will certainly appear. Good luck and success to you!

Super Schoolboy Remastered was created to help students learn the multiplication table quickly and efficiently.

Usage:
On the main screen below the start train button there is a train setup button where you can view and change settings related directly to training sessions. You can start a training session by tapping the button on the main screen with the corresponding text. The principles of the application are not much different from its "ancestor" version. During a training session depending on the timer settings you will be given a time to respond. Use the keyboard in the window to enter it. After pressing the button to enter the answer or the timer expires the answer will be sent for checking and according to its results the counter of correct or incorrect answers will be replenished. Unlike the original "Super Schoolboy" application the training session can only be completed manually (the possibility of "losing" for example due to 3 incorrect answers has been removed).

Also the application has other useful functions (for example statistics) and information materials. Navigation to them is done through a side pull-down menu.

The app has a function for getting rank and achievements. To activate it link your Google Play Games account and select the appropriate item in the settings. The rank shows the general level of the player it can be viewed in detail in the statistics window. Achievements are awarded subject to certain conditions their full list can be viewed directly in the Google Play Games app

Good luck and success!
